video.title: Blue Bloods
video.synopsis: Cops Danny and Jamie Reagan and their lawyer sister Erin try to live up to the standards of their father, Frank, who's the NYC police commissioner.

episodes.synopsis: In the pilot episode, Jamie graduates from the Police Academy and joins the NYPD after deciding not to pursue his career as a lawyer.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: A good Samaritan who takes action against a criminal terrorizing the subway has the Reagans pondering the rights and wrongs of vigilantism.
episodes.title: Samaritan

episodes.synopsis: Erin, Frank and Danny must find a way to bring justice for a rape victim when the suspect is protected by diplomatic immunity.
episodes.title: Privilege

episodes.synopsis: The entire NYPD is mobilized to find the killer of a police officer who exchanged gunfire with robbers during a diamond heist.
episodes.title: Officer Down

episodes.synopsis: Frank, Danny and the rest of the NYPD search for a bomb set to detonate in Manhattan. The Reagans argue the merits and downfalls of profiling.
episodes.title: What You See

episodes.synopsis: Danny must find the narcotic source when three teenagers die from a drug overdose.
episodes.title: Smack Attack

episodes.synopsis: Erin's family debates her methods when she uses a law-abiding citizen as bait to take down his gang leader brother.
episodes.title: Brothers

episodes.synopsis: Jamie witnesses a crime in progress and kills the suspect while pursuing him. Danny must solve the case to clear Jamie's name.
episodes.title: Chinatown

episodes.synopsis: Three released prison inmates place the Reagan family in danger. They try to get one of the criminal's surviving victims to testify against him.
episodes.title: Re-Do

episodes.synopsis: While Danny investigates the murder of a popular nightclub's doorman, Frank gets information that his ex-partner is covering up crimes.
episodes.title: After Hours

episodes.synopsis: A cold case of Frank's is brought to the forefront when a missing boy's remains are found. Danny and Jackie look into the death of a high-end escort.
episodes.title: Little Fish

episodes.synopsis: Danny investigates when the son of a Russian gangster is killed and Erin is assigned a high-profile corruption case.
episodes.title: Family Ties

episodes.synopsis: Because it involves classified information and a sleeper cell, Frank assigns Danny to cover the shooting of an undercover counter-terrorism agent.
episodes.title: Hall of Mirrors

episodes.synopsis: A drug addict becomes the prime focus of Danny and Jackie's investigation after the man's girlfriend is kidnapped and held for ransom.
episodes.title: My Funny Valentine

episodes.synopsis: Is someone out to assassinate the Commissioner or was the shooting random? Danny takes on the assignment to find out the answer.
episodes.title: Dedication

episodes.synopsis: Nicky goes with Danny to a crime scene where a girl has been murdered, and she has a difficult time coping after seeing her first murder victim.
episodes.title: Age of Innocence

episodes.synopsis: As a former Marine, Danny feels responsible for finding the killer of a Marine war hero. There's a false rumor that Frank is going to run for mayor.
episodes.title: Silver Star

episodes.synopsis: Just before Danny is to testify at a Peruvian drug lord's murder trial, Linda is kidnapped. This drug lord has a history of intimidating witnesses.
episodes.title: To Tell the Truth

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Jackie investigate the cut-throat world of fashion after Linda's runway model niece and a reporter are poisoned at a fashion show.
episodes.title: Model Behavior

episodes.synopsis: Frank's frustrations rise when the media sensationalizes the murder of a tourist shot and killed outside a trendy Lower East Side restaurant.
episodes.title: All That Glitters

episodes.synopsis: Neighbors of the Reagans are murdered, and their son becomes the prime suspect. Jamie is convinced he's being pursued by the Blue Templar.
episodes.title: Cellar Boy

episodes.synopsis: When a drug bust points to dirty cops, Frank decides not to involve Internal Affairs in the hopes of taking down and exposing the Blue Templar.
episodes.title: The Blue Templar

episodes.synopsis: When one of his supporters is murdered, the new mayor pressures Frank to spin the killing as a random act of violence.
episodes.title: Mercy

episodes.synopsis: After Danny accidentally shoots a cop, Internal Affairs starts an investigation, focusing on his state of mind at the time of the shooting.
episodes.title: Friendly Fire

episodes.synopsis: Danny discovers that a former cop is one of the men who attempted to rob a bank. Meanwhile, Jamie gets a new partner.
episodes.title: Critical Condition

episodes.synopsis: Erin reopens an 18-year-old rape case first investigated by Frank. Meanwhile, Danny and Jackie probe the murders of three teens in a park.
episodes.title: Innocence

episodes.synopsis: While on a case, Danny tries to swing a romantic weekend with Linda. Elsewhere, Jamie's undercover assignment takes him inside a crime family.
episodes.title: A Night on the Town

episodes.synopsis: Frank must deal with a political crisis after Jamie and Renzulli are injured while attempting to enter a religious center in response to a 911 call.
episodes.title: Black and Blue

episodes.synopsis: When a serial killer starts targeting prostitutes, Jackie goes undercover as an escort. Meanwhile, Erin meets a man who shares her interests.
episodes.title: Lonely Hearts Club

episodes.synopsis: Henry's heart attack on Thanksgiving eve leaves the family pondering a future without him. Meanwhile, Danny and Jackie look into an alleged suicide.
episodes.title: Thanksgiving

episodes.synopsis: To get leniency for his son, an ex-mobster helps Danny on some cold cases. Meanwhile, Jamie works undercover in the Sanfino crime family.
episodes.title: Moonlighting

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Erin must work together to find out who killed her informant.
episodes.title: Whistle Blower

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Jackie investigate when a uniformed officer is seen fleeing the scene of a murder at a diner.
episodes.title: The Uniform

episodes.synopsis: While driving his family home, Danny becomes involved in a shooting after his car strikes a man running from a gunman.
episodes.title: The Job

episodes.synopsis: After a rich woman dies of a heart attack, her daughter claims God told her that her mother was murdered, prompting Danny and Jackie to investigate.
episodes.title: Leap of Faith

episodes.synopsis: When a thief is shot and killed after robbing and beating a family, the Reagans ponder how far they'd go to protect one another.
episodes.title: Parenthood

episodes.synopsis: Danny's family worries about his emotional state as he and Jackie investigate the murder of a Reagan family friend who was an undercover detective.
episodes.title: The Life We Choose

episodes.synopsis: A high-profile reporter, who happens to be a close friend of Frank's, is almost assaulted. Elsewhere, Jamie's undercover case reaches a crucial stage.
episodes.title: Women with Guns

episodes.synopsis: While Erin is prosecuting a homicide case, the defendant's lawyer is murdered. Danny investigates, and things get tense when Erin cross-examines him.
episodes.title: Reagan v. Reagan

episodes.synopsis: A gun buyback program has a no-questions-asked rule, but when a returned gun is linked to a robbery, Danny must decide whether to arrest the suspect.
episodes.title: No Questions Asked

episodes.synopsis: Pressured by the 12-year-old son of a firefighter whose death was ruled a suicide, Danny reopens a closed case, enraging his fellow detectives.
episodes.title: Some Kind of Hero

episodes.synopsis: After an attempt is made on the life of a witness in protective custody, Danny and Jackie discover a leak within the department.
episodes.title: Working Girls

episodes.synopsis: A big-spending investor's death looks suspicious to Danny and Jackie. Meanwhile, Jamie is placed under house arrest when a hit is put out on his life.
episodes.title: Collateral Damage

episodes.synopsis: Unbeknownst to his family, Frank must deal with a potential biological weapons attack on New York City as the Reagans celebrate Mother's Day.
episodes.title: Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: A dangerous criminal from Danny's past comes back to seek revenge and kidnaps Jackie. Meanwhile, Jamie meets his new partner.
episodes.title: Family Business

episodes.synopsis: When an injured woman recants her claim of domestic violence, Danny and Jackie find that she is involved in a secret relationship.
episodes.title: Domestic Disturbance

episodes.synopsis: Danny believes a serial killer is on the loose when two separate murder victims are identified as members of a group charged with a gang rape.
episodes.title: Old Wounds

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Jackie set out to investigate the murder of a bride on her wedding day in a drive-by gang shooting, but are diverted to a different case.
episodes.title: Scorched Earth

episodes.synopsis: Shortly after Frank awards a detective with a medal for his undercover work in Malaysia, the detective is taken hostage by a Malaysian drug lord.
episodes.title: Risk and Reward

episodes.synopsis: When Erin's key witness, an infamous photographer, is nearly killed in a hit and run, she arranges for Danny to safeguard him.
episodes.title: Greener Grass

episodes.synopsis: When a knife-wielding attacker dressed as Baron Samedi, the Spirit of Death, stabs a man in costume on Halloween, Danny enters the world of voodoo.
episodes.title: Nightmares

episodes.synopsis: Danny arrives at a college campus to find a murdered student, who was thought to be dealing drugs.
episodes.title: Higher Education

episodes.synopsis: When Danny and Kate come up empty-handed on leads for a shooting, Linda overhears the victim telling his priest who is responsible.
episodes.title: Secrets and Lies

episodes.synopsis: When two motorists driving gas-guzzling cars die at the hands of a sniper, the city believes it's the work of a radical environmental serial killer.
episodes.title: Fathers and Sons

episodes.synopsis: Jamie must deal with the emotional consequences of his actions on the job when he has a confrontation with a suicidal man.
episodes.title: Front Page News

episodes.synopsis: Danny's car matches an NYPD description of a vehicle involved in a drug deal, and he is taken into custody when cocaine is found in the trunk.
episodes.title: Framed

episodes.synopsis: When a man with multiple rat bites is thrown from a moving car, Danny works the case to find out who was trying to send a message and why.
episodes.title: Inside Jobs

episodes.synopsis: Before a Hasidic grand rebbe passes away, he chooses his youngest son to succeed him. But when the new appointee dies suddenly, Danny investigates.
episodes.title: Men in Black

episodes.synopsis: When a 10-year-old boy is the victim of an incident in the projects, Danny's heated approach to the case lands him in anger management class.
episodes.title: Warriors

episodes.synopsis: Erin and Danny investigate a cold case involving a girl who was attacked by her rich and powerful boyfriend, who was never convicted.
episodes.title: Quid Pro Quo

episodes.synopsis: When an off-duty cop tries to stop a bank robbery, he is disarmed by the "Bonnie and Clyde" robbers who take his gun and wound an innocent bystander.
episodes.title: Protest Too Much

episodes.synopsis: When the same tragedy occurs to people who don't appear to be connected, Danny must find out what they have in common and who is responsible.
episodes.title: No Regrets

episodes.synopsis: When a religious young woman is murdered, Danny questions her family members, who are shocked to learn that she had a secret relationship.
episodes.title: Loss of Faith

episodes.synopsis: When two Wall Street brokers are killed in drug deals, Danny looks to question a wounded accomplice at the hospital, but he is stopped by Linda.
episodes.title: Ends & Means

episodes.synopsis: When Danny finds a disoriented man covered in blood in a park, he finds it hard to believe that the man has no recollection of the night's events.
episodes.title: Devil's Breath

episodes.synopsis: When a young woman commits suicide, Danny is emotional because he promised to help the woman when her parents were taken from her.
episodes.title: The Bitter End

episodes.synopsis: As the Reagans rally to take down a gang leader responsible for the murder of someone close to them, Danny looks to the leader's girlfriend for help.
episodes.title: This Way Out

episodes.synopsis: When an armed robbery ends with the death of a police officer, Frank makes it a mission for the NYPD to bring the suspect to justice.
episodes.title: Unwritten Rules

episodes.synopsis: When famous movie star Russell Berke is stabbed, Danny goes to his aid, but must keep the crime on the down-low due to Berke's celebrity status.
episodes.title: The City That Never Sleeps

episodes.synopsis: Danny becomes the lead hostage negotiator when a prime informant in a large drug case holds Erin at gunpoint inside the courtroom.
episodes.title: To Protect and Serve

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez investigate the death of a teenage girl who appears to have been pushed in front of a subway car by a homeless man.
episodes.title: The Truth About Lying

episodes.synopsis: When Danny and Baez suspect a little girl might be the victim of a kidnapping, the girl's mother denies it, but her story doesn't add up.
episodes.title: Lost and Found

episodes.synopsis: When a gangbanger dies after Jamie chases him away from the boy he's mentoring, Jamie's conduct is called into question.
episodes.title: Growing Boys

episodes.synopsis: When an officer is accused of using excessive force on a suspect, Frank finds his department under scrutiny from the community and the mayor.
episodes.title: Drawing Dead

episodes.synopsis: After Frank has dinner with mob lawyer Angelo Gallo, Gallo is shot and Frank narrowly escapes with his own life.
episodes.title: Justice Served

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez investigate a homicide in which Baez's estranged brother, a former drug addict, is the lead suspect.
episodes.title: Bad Blood

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez investigate a local bombing, but meet with tension and resistance from the community during the investigation.
episodes.title: Mistaken Identity

episodes.synopsis: Danny's loyalty is tested when he's assigned to the case of a childhood friend who is under investigation for having ties to an infamous mob family.
episodes.title: Ties That Bind

episodes.synopsis: When Danny learns from Nicky that there's a deadly new brand of heroin hitting the streets, he begins an all-out manhunt for the distributor.
episodes.title: The Bogeyman

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez must track down a Marine veteran who may be suffering from PTSD. Meanwhile, Frank is caught off-guard during a press conference.
episodes.title: Unfinished Business

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez investigate the murder of Tiffany Lamp, a popular drag queen from a reality television show who was found murdered in a local park.
episodes.title: Manhattan Queens

episodes.synopsis: When Danny and Baez investigate the kidnapping of a young girl who disappeared after school, it brings back difficult memories for Danny.
episodes.title: Open Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Danny takes a call from a woman who is threatening to kill herself along with the man who killed her parents in a drunk-driving accident.
episodes.title: Insult to Injury

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez investigate when an expectant mother is a victim of a "knockout game," in which teenagers punch unsuspecting civilians in the head.
episodes.title: Knockout Game

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez investigate the death of a woman whose body was dumped after she was killed by a lethal dose of lidocaine after secret plastic surgery.
episodes.title: Righting Wrongs

episodes.synopsis: Danny and Baez investigate the murder of a respected college professor who was involved with a questionable scholarship program.
episodes.title: Secret Arrangements

episodes.synopsis: Erin is assigned to investigate a case in which an on-duty police officer is accused of killing a suspect already in custody.
episodes.title: Custody Battle

episodes.synopsis: When a detective from Danny's precinct is killed while working undercover, Frank puts on a full-court press to find his killer.
episodes.title: Above and Beyond

episodes.synopsis: When Danny is placed on modified duty after investigating a case that was off-limits, he realizes somebody is trying to keep something quiet.
episodes.title: Exiles
